org.usfirst.frc.team2495.robot

Class ControllerBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team2495.robot.ControllerBase

  • public class ControllerBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The ControllerBase class handles all input coming from the gamepad, left joystick, and right joystick. This has various methods to get input, buttons, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ControllerBase.GamepadButtons
      The GamepadButtons class contains all the button bindings for the Gamepad.
      static class  ControllerBase.JoystickButtons
      The JoystickButtons class contains all the button bindings for the Joysticks.
      static class  ControllerBase.Joysticks
      The Joysticks enum contains namespaces for the gamepad, left joystick, and right joystick

      • ControllerBase

        public ControllerBase(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick gamepad,
                      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick leftStick,
                      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick rightStick)
         public ControllerBase(Joystick gamepad,
                       Joystick leftStick,
                       Joystick rightStick)
        Constructs a new ControllerBase with the specified Joysticks for the gamepad, left joystick, and right joystick.
        Parameters:
        gamepad - the Joystick to use for the gamepad.
        leftStick - the Joystick to use for the left joystick.
        rightStick - the Joystick to use for the right joystick.

      • update

        public void update()
         public void update()
        Updates the btn and btnPrev arrays.

      • getPressedDown

        public boolean getPressedDown(ControllerBase.Joysticks contNum,
                              int buttonNum)
         public boolean getPressedDown(Joysticks contNum, 
                               int buttonNum)
        Gets whether or not a button from the specified Joystick is pressed.
        Parameters:
        contNum - the Joystick to check the button from
        buttonNum - the index of the button to test
        Returns:
        true if the button on the specified Joystick is pressed, false otherwise

      • getReleased

        public boolean getReleased(ControllerBase.Joysticks contNum,
                           int buttonNum)
         public boolean getReleased(Joysticks contNum, 
                               int buttonNum)
        Gets whether or not a button from the specified Joystick was released.
        Parameters:
        contNum - the Joystick to check the button from
        buttonNum - the index of the button to test
        Returns:
        true if the button on the specified Joystick was released, false otherwise

         public void rumble(boolean rumble)
        Rumbles the gamepad
        Parameters:
        rumble - whether or not to set the rumble on
